creation_history: Created by kleines Filmr√∂llchen on March 16th, 2022. Reason: After Sam [ninja'd everyone on explaining WHF to a newcomer](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/830522505605283866/953749358690594907), people reacted to his message with :ninja: as usual. Kleines then responded with "we need :ninjak:" and it was promptly created by him and added shortly afterwards. Though the name was proposed as 'nin**j**ak', it was originally added as 'nin**jy**ak' and later renamed to 'nin**y**ak' around April 7th, 2022.
description: A ninja yak. The standard ninja emoji (:ninja:) has been in use for some time, also with the :ninjamerge: custom emoji, to express when somebody else was faster at something than you; you were "ninja'd". :ninjamerge: in particular is used when your PR was merged unexpectedly / unexpectedly fast.
remark: It hides in the shadows... and it's always faster than you.
name: Ninyak
